title: VA Help War Child - Sinead O'Connor, Portishead, Radiohead et
description:
VA Help War Child - Sinead O&#039;Connor, Portishead, Radiohead etc.

The CD "Help" was released in 1995 to benefit the international organization,
War Child.  The organization raises money through music to "...benefit peace through investing hope in the lives of children caught up in the horrors of war."  If you want to know more about War Child and sample more musical offerings,
please visit:     <a href=" http://www.warchild.org" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.warchild.org</a>  

In the meantime, please enjoy this past great work.  It&#039;s an excellent sampling of
music from bands and artists from the UK and Ireland.  

(Ripped to flac using EAC.  Cue sheet and artwork included.)



1. Oasis and Friends - Fade Away
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Noel Gallagher
Recording location : Maison Rouge, London

2. The Boo Radleys - Oh Brother
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Martin Carr
Recording location : The Church, London

3. The Stone Roses - Love Spreads
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Squire
Recording location : Rockfield, Wales

4. Radiohead - Lucky
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Radiohead
Recording location : Marcus, London

5. Orbital - Adnan
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : P & P Hartnell
Recording location : The Strongroom, London

6. Portishead - Mourning Air
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Barrow/Gibbons/Utley
Recording location : State of Art, Bristol

7. Massive Attack - Fake the Aroma
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Massive Attack/Tricky
Recording location : Live at the Coachhouse, Bristol

8. Suede - Shipbuilding
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Clive Langer/Elvis Costello
Recording location : Olympic, London

9. The Charlatans - Time for Livin&#039;
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Sly & The Family Stone
Recording location : Square Centre, Nottingham

10. Stereo MC&#039;s - Sweetest Truth (Show No Fear)
Additional vocals by Cath Coffey
Additional keyboards by Mike McEvoy
Additional brass by Kickhorns
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Birch/Hallam
Recording location : The Workhouse, London

11. Sinead O&#039;Connor - Ode to Billy Joe
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Gentry

12. The Levellers - Searchlights
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Rev Hammer
Recording location : Metway, Brighton

13. Manic Street Preachers - Raindrops Keep Falling on my Head
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Burt Bacharach/Hal David
Recording location : Chateau de la Rouge Mont, France

14. Terrorvision - Tom Petty Loves Veruca Salt
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Terrorvision
Recording location : Britannia Row, London

15. The One World Orchestra - The Magnificent
Featured Artists : The Massed Pipes and Drums of the 
Children&#039;s Free Revolutionary Volunteer Guards
Recording location : Townhouse Studios, London

16. Planet 4 Folk Quartet - Message to Crommie
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Andrew Weatherall/Dave Harrow
Recording location : Planet 4, Manchester

17. Terry Hall and Salad - Dream a Little Dream
Orchestra : Electra Strings are Caroline Lavelle,
Joselyn Pook, Julia Singleton, Anne Wood. String arrangement
by Harvey B. Composer(s) / Writer(s) : W Schwandt/F Andree/Gus Khan
Recording location : Metropolis Studios, London

18. Neneh Cherry and Trout - 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Cherry, McVey, Sharp, Falk
Recording location : Malaga

19. Blur - Eine Kleine Lift Musik
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Albarn, Coxon, James, Rowntree
Recording location : Matrix Studios, London

20. The Mojo Filters - Come Together
Featuring: Paul Weller, Noel Gallagher, Paul McCartney
(on Wurlitzer Organ)
Composer(s) / Writer(s) : Lennon/McCartney
Recording location : Abbey Road Studios
